name: Disasteroids
description:
You may think you've played this game before—but you've never played it like this! Dodging the asteroids with your accelerometer-happy device is just the beginning. TAPPING the asteroids to destroy them has never been more satisfying!

Wobble and weave through ever-more-constrained swarms of asteroids to gain a slew of achievements (including one hidden achievement!), and challenge your friends through the Game Center!

Great art, fun sound and particle effects, and a lovely, moody background track.
